name: Caveman Hunter
description:
Bring down the most ferocious animals of the prehistoric era including the wooly mammoth, cave bear, saber tooth tiger, and even some relics of the Jurassic era like pterodactyl!

Choose from jungle, desert, and cave levels! Panthers, boars, bears, wooly mammoths, wolves and other fearsome creatures prowl the terrain.

This app features the latest in high end rendering, baked and dynamic lighting, detailed textures, large number of animations, and finely tuned character controls.
